original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 303.50/304.20 to dollar at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 304.50/304.20 against the US dollar in the spot market on Wednesday, and bond and t-bill yields were slightly up.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.85/27.00 percent unchanged from Tuesday’s close.
Three-months T-bill was quoted at 25.25/75 percent, up from 25.10/75 percent on Tuesday.
The Sri Lanka rupee closed at 303.50/304.20 against the US dollar in the spot market on Wednesday from 306.30/50 rupees a day earlier. (Colombo/May24/2023)
